properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 6 at 4:01AM MST until February 7 at 4:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Heavy snow for the Ogden Valley. Additional snow
accumulations of 4 to 10 inches in the Ogden Valley and 1 to 3
inches elsewhere in the Wasatch Mountain Valleys.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult, especially in the
Ogden valley.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST FRIDAY FOR THE OGDEN VALLEY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 MST FRIDAY FOR THE WASATCH MOUNTAIN VALLEYS EXCEPT THE OGDEN VALLEY
